name: Jammy Jump!
description:
Two player local multiplayer game/single player game

In this game you control either the player, or the colored platforms. (Or both of them if you play it in your own, but this is less fun)

The player is controlled by the left and right arrow keys and can jump by pressing the space bar.

The person that controls the platforms has as a target to make the other player fall. These platforms can be controlled by A, S and D.

My single player record is 84 and my multiplayer record against my brother was like 14, good luck beating me :P
